author: Staff Reporter
text:
The election surveillance team seized Rs.15 lakh from a car near Vandavasi on Thursday.

The occupant of the car identified himself as Sivaprasath Naidu from Madanapalli in Chittoor and he reportedly claimed that he was taking the cash to pay fees for his son, studying in Mahatma Gandhi Medical College in Puducherry. As he could not provide any proof the cash was seized and deposited with the treasury. He was asked to bring proof.
title: Squad seizes Rs. 15 lakh from car
